game.name: Grimslair
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Build modular battle cards from Soulwords harvested from fallen souls. Travel back & forth through time to refine your deck and forge synergies your way. As Adam, the Grim Reaper’s son, you’ll fight beside your dog, meet your father’s daily soul quota, and bring your girlfriend back from the dead.
